entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
